title: JRR Tolkien's The Hobbit Extended Edition
description:
This is an Extended Edition of Dustin Lee's JRR Tolkien's The Hobbit Fanedit.

Extra features in this movie include:-

1) A 279 minute running time
2) Extended Edition Beorn intro scene
3) Extended Edition Mirkwood scenes
4) Extended Edition opening to the battle of the five armies
5) More Laketown added to the movie

There are other scenes that have been added here and there but the movie still has a focused narrative. I have amended some transition scenes and added a few previously removed scenes here and there that I had wished we're in Dustin's movie.

I have also re-added color to the first part of the movie as I feel the movie suffered when the color was mellowed down.

Hope you enjoy this
Cheers
 

PS. None of this would have been possible without Dustin Lee and I'd like to thank him
